content:
lbergnehr opened Issue #85

I know we've discussed and prototyped this a couple of times (@isaacvetter, @NiklasSvenzen, @wmaethner) but did we ever talk about including a measurement event in the standard event catalog? I'm thinking of the scenario where someone is, for example, writing a report in an EMR and doing measurements in a PACS and would like the measurements to show up in the structured report.

/cc @fordanic who sparked the discussion here at Sectra this time.
